ygData.subject: Plate/Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I hear that these things are going into the game soon. Will they? If so, any time on when? A guess... or something. All comments are welcomed. Just want to
ygData.messageBody:
I hear that these things are going into the game soon. Will they? If so, any
time on when? A guess... or something. All comments are welcomed. Just want
to find out. Can't wait until this is in, be a very rich person! Plate tunics
at 400 - 500pp instead of the thousands... very nice. Very rich, very famous.
:-) Powergamers dream, and that I am. Please don't flame me on that, just
stick to the topic. =) Thanks much.

Danthin, Human Magician, Master Smith (121)
~Veeshan~

P.S. If any of you are on Veeshan, and see someone wanting banded, have them
tell me. Thanks.
